import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/Register.css' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', userName: '', password: '', birth: '', role: '' }) const [showError, setShowError] = useState(false) const handleUser = (key, value) => { let updated = {...user} updated[key] = value setUser(updated) } const confirmPassword = (value) => { if(value != '' && user.password !== value) { setShowError(true) } else { setShowError(false) } } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Formulario de registro

handleUser('lastName', e.target.value)} />

handleUser('userName', e.target.value)} />
handleUser('password', e.target.value)} />
confirmPassword(e.target.value)} /> {showError ?

) } export default Register
